Remover a primeira ocorrência

--IN : Valor x e lista u
--OUT: Versão de u removendo primeira aparição de x
removida.
deletee 5 [] == []
deletee 1 [1] == []
deletee 4 [1,3,4] == [1,3]
deletee 3 [4,3,1,3] == [4,1,3]
deletee 5 [1,5,6,9] == [1,6,9]

Testes

>>>>>>>>
5
[]
========
[]
<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>
1
[1]
========
[]
<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>
4
[1,3,4]
========
[1,3]
<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>
3
[4,3,1,3]
========
[4,1,3]
<<<<<<<<

>>>>>>>>
5
[1,5,6,9]
========
[1,6,9]
<<<<<<<<
